about_the_game:
March for Glory!

The drums of war echo across Britannia! Do you have what it takes to survive the brutal march along Roman Trail? In this 2D, rogue-like, comedy adventure, you step into the boots of a Roman Centurion, leading your scrappy band of Legionaries through a perilous journey during the Roman invasion of Britannia in 43 CE. With dark humor and a satirical twist, Roman Trail blends history with hilarity, throwing players into ambushes, unexpected accidents, and the ever-looming threat of dysentery. Every decision matters—will you make it to the next camp, survive brutal battles, and conquer the relentless march toward glory?

Features:

  • Single player, retro game experience

  • Short, challenging runs of each marching trail

  • Procedurally generated events and minigames keep each run unique

  • Fusion of historical realism and dark humor

  • Multiple branching campaign paths as you truly conquer Britannia

  • Challenging final events that reflect ancient battles or sieges

  • Unlockable passive buffs at the end of each run: they help future marches but also carry unexpected negative buffs

  • Morale & reputation system that reacts to player choice

  • Expansive minigames allow players explore, pillage forage, hang out on sentry duty, control local riots, and even challenge Barbarian champions to 1:1 combat for BIG payoffs!

There has never been a better time to play a game about ancient Rome. March for Glory!

content_descriptors.notes: Pixelated combat without blood, characters can die on screen. There is no sexualized content depicted in Roman Trail.

short_description: March for Glory! Enlist in the Roman Legions, spread civilization and freedom to the Barbarians of Britannia with fire & the sword. A hilarious 2D, roguelike, pixel adventure. Just don't die of dysentery.
